def tongues(code):
    vowels = ['a', 'i', 'y', 'e', 'o', 'u']
    consonants = ['b', 'k', 'x', 'z', 'n', 'h', 'd', 'c', 'w', 'g', 'p', 'v', 'j', 'q', 't', 's', 'r', 'l', 'm', 'f']

    def decode_char(char):
        if char.lower() in vowels:
            index = vowels.index(char.lower())
            decoded_index = (index + 3) % len(vowels)
            return vowels[decoded_index].upper() if char.isupper() else vowels[decoded_index]
        elif char.lower() in consonants:
            index = consonants.index(char.lower())
            decoded_index = (index + 10) % len(consonants)
            return consonants[decoded_index].upper() if char.isupper() else consonants[decoded_index]
        else:
            return char

    decoded_text = ''.join([decode_char(char) for char in code])
    return decoded_text

print(tongues("Wb rsjvbnk jzwycm cr hdw aqmeefw tcrs bnjw jw kqxywl ns kqxywl."))
print(tongues("Rfc qom xur dbfmzi."))
print(tongues("Vqhm vjkfkwzktu jqd zgqxd jcumyq. Bqebg idq txg cgm nuumwqhn nqembd bohmfqxj. Gdv whn gea cnj aeoq hmt twgn mjwnnw."))
print(tongues("Mga rbtdkpoh bplwfm qeb zwfigfp bogclclup lcqb mbl bpibqo up lcqb."))

def tongues(code):
    vowels = ['a', 'i', 'y', 'e', 'o', 'u']
    consonants = ['b', 'k', 'x', 'z', 'n', 'h', 'd', 'c', 'w', 'g', 'p', 'v', 'j', 'q', 't', 's', 'r', 'l', 'm', 'f']

    def decode_char(char):
        if char.lower() in vowels:
            index = vowels.index(char.lower())
            decoded_index = (index + 3) % len(vowels)
            return vowels[decoded_index].upper() if char.isupper() else vowels[decoded_index]
        elif char.lower() in consonants:
            index = consonants.index(char.lower())
            decoded_index = (index + 10) % len(consonants)
            return consonants[decoded_index].upper() if char.isupper() else consonants[decoded_index]
        else:
            return char

    decoded_text = ''.join([decode_char(char) for char in code])
    return decoded_text

print(tongues("Wb rsjvbnk jzwycm cr hdw aqmeefw tcrs bnjw jw kqxywl ns kqxywl."))
